bug.question: I have six legs and love to eat leaves. I change into something beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start as a tiny egg.
🌿 I munch on plants all day long.
🦋 I end up with colorful wings.

bug.question: I make honey, and I live in a hive. I can sting you if you bother me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I collect sweet nectar.
🐝 I am very busy and work hard.
⚠️ I have a stinger I only use if I feel threatened.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I have long back legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to live in fields and meadows.
🎶 I sometimes make a chirping sound.
🦵 My back legs help me jump really high.

bug.question: I am a tiny worker and live in colonies. I carry things much bigger than myself. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 We work together.
🏠 We live in a big hill.
💪 I'm small, but very strong.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glow. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have a light on my bottom.
🌃 I am often seen in the summer.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I have spots on my back and bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am red and black.
🍀 Some people believe I bring good fortune.
🍎 I eat aphids that can harm plants.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food, but I'm not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I eat flies and other bugs.

bug.question: I am a noisy insect that rubs its wings together. I sing loudly in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My song is very loud.
🌳 I live in trees.
☀️ I am most active in hot weather.

bug.question: I can walk on water, but I'm not magic! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am very light.
🐾 I have long legs that spread my weight.
🐛 I am an insect often found on ponds.

bug.question: I mimic another insect to protect myself. I look like a wasp but don't have a stinger. What am I?

hints.text: 🎭 I am pretending to be something else.
⚠️ I look dangerous, but I'm harmless.
🪰 I am a type of fly.

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I come out at night. I give off light, what am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I twinkle in the sky.
💡 I'm not the sun.
✨ I'm very, very far away.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that gives the Earth light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot.
☀️ We see me during the day.
🌎 The Earth goes around me.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, but I am not alive. Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese.
🌑 I reflect the sun's light.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One of me looks like a bear.
✨ I am made of stars.
🔭 People use telescopes to see me better.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball that travels around the sun. Earth is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I can have water and land on me.
🪐 I am round.
☀️ There are eight of my type in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the sun. I am smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Some people see me burning up in the atmosphere as a shooting star.
💥 I can sometimes crash into planets.
🪨 I am made of rock and metal.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our Sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I'm very, very big!
🌌 There are billions like me in the universe.
🥛 I am often described as 'milky'.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun and keeps you on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree helped discover me.
⬇️ I pull things down.
⚖️ Without me, you would float away!

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that not even light can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am invisible.
🌀 I suck everything in.
🕳️ Nothing, not even light, can escape me.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, often where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can have beautiful colors.
👶 I am a stellar nursery.
💥 Stars explode and leave me behind.
